title: Accomodating and Friendly Hotel with Hidden Perks
text: Love my stay at this hotel. It wasn't overly fancy and had a fun, casual feel to it. The staff was extremely accomodating and friendly. They remembered my name throughout the duration of my stay and were very helpful. The hotel also offered a free wine "happy hour" each night that was definitely a perk to staying there. Great location, easy to get around from hotel.
